thread.title: Level of service needs vast improvement
thread.title_full: Level of service needs vast improvement - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: S7646FSangiec
title: Level of service needs vast improvement
text: Problem at check in, level of service and attitude needs improvement. Procedures should be consistent and fair to all guests regardless of nationality. Very disappointed with the stay and will not recommend to other travellers.
